name: myRewards Tree
overview:
Creating loyal customers is a central tenant of just about every company’s marketing strategy. Whether they offer points, miles or cash the goal of loyalty programs is to keep customers coming back. Why do they offer rewards? Because it’s cheaper and easier to retain an existing customer than acquire a new one.

myRewards Tree recognizes that consumers belong to more than 18 rewards programs– becoming quickly overwhelmed and ultimately losing track of what they’ve earned. The company loses the benefit of retaining a loyal customer and the consumer misses out on great savings and rewards.

With our experience in digital and loyalty marketing, personal finance and consumer credit, we’ve developed a solution that will finally bring loyal customers closer to the companies they patronize.
